Neil Seidel
Artistic Director, Composer, Guitarist

Neil Seidel performed with L.A.’s top studio musicians for many years, as well as producing Special Events for Fortune 500 companies. SeidelEventProductions.com

A master guitarist and composer, Seidel is currently scoring films, commercials, and documentaries at his studio, Independent Creative Sources, in Los Angeles and Palm Springs, California.

Contact

His expertise spans many musical genres. A former member of the critically acclaimed Indian world music group “Shanti", the hit rock-n-roll band “Gary Lewis & the Playboys", and is listed in Kingsbury’s “Who’s Who in Country Western Music" for his innovative guitar playing.

Recent projects include the release of his current CD, "My Nova Scotia Home" as well as "Dreams of Mexico" and "Princess Pukalani’s Hula" all based on his inspiring world travels.

The Independent Creative Sources Studio is fully equipped to produce a wide variety of orchestral, world, and library background music for film, commercials, video, and theatre projects.

Sample CD available upon request.

  • "Music From The Heart" Jaques Harosh - World Music

Book

Leaving Life
A Simple Guide to Planning Your Estate and Not Leaving a Mess

Leaving Life is an easy to read discussion of the need to plan one’s estate in order to avoid chaos, confusion and competition in the lives of those you leave behind. Other interesting topics include, financial planning, documenting a legacy, cataloging valuables and some philosophic contemplations on the nature of our mortality. The book concepts have already helped many people begin to prepare their estates and think about the responsibility of taking action creating wills, living trusts, final arrangements and dealing with possessions.
